import React, { useState } from 'react' import { MDBCollapse, MDBContainer, MDBIcon, MDBNavbar, MDBNavbarBrand, MDBNavbarNav, MDBNavbarToggler, MDBNavbarItem, MDBNavbarLink, } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; import { useTypedSelector } from '../hooks/type-selector'; const Header: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(true); const { user } = useTypedSelector(signin => signin.signin); const handleLogout = () => { console.log("logout"); } return ( Touropedia setShow(!show)} style={{ color: "#606080" }} > { user?.id &&
Logged in as: {user.name}
}

 } ); } export { Header };
